name: Witch.rpg
description:
Collect costumes and beat up monsters!

________

I made this way back in 2015 in half a week, and updated it in 2019 [again, taking half a week to do so]. It's pretty janky, to be perfectly honest, but don't let that dissuade you from trying it out.

Also some of the outfits are slightly revealing, so maybe keep that in mind?

Music, as almost always, is stolen from a variety of sources.
